summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges incurred, including transportation and special handling fees, totaling $78.14, and provides information on payment due by May 3, 2005.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The invoice is dated April 18, 2005, and details charges for shipping services provided to Jeffrey Epstein.
Total charges on the invoice amount to $78.14, with a payment due date of May 3, 2005.
The invoice includes a fuel surcharge of 6.12 and a base discount of 2.23.
The shipment was picked up on April 4, 2005, and was sent from Natalia Anatoly Siodan to Jeffrey Epstein.
The document contains multiple references to FedEx services and billing procedures.
